column2:
Solar_CapacityVsLCOE %>%  plot_ly(
    x = ~Capacityfactor, 
    y = ~IntalledCost, 
    size = ~LCOE, 
    color = ~Continent, 
    frame = ~Year, 
    text = ~Continent, 
    hoverinfo = "text",
    type = 'scatter',
    mode = 'markers',
    fil=~'') %>%
 layout(title = "Wind Power Installations Cost Vs Capacity Factors",
        xaxis=list(title="Capacity Factors"),
        yaxis = list(title="Wind Power Installation Cost 
                     (USD/kWatt)"))
